data.database_description: This database is designed to manage document-related processes within an organization, including tracking document types, statuses, drafts, circulation history, and mailing details. It supports various operations such as creating, updating, and archiving documents along with their associated metadata like shipping information and employee roles. The schema ensures data integrity through foreign key constraints that link related entities, such as documents to their statuses, types, and draft copies.

columns.columnDescription: Code representing a document type.
Description of the document type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table containing descriptions for different document types.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each role.
Description of what the role entails.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Describes different roles within the organization, including their meanings.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each address.
Details of the address, such as country or region code.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores address details for mailing purposes.

columns.columnDescription: Code representing a document status.
Description of the document status.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table containing descriptions for different document statuses.

columns.columnDescription: Code representing a shipping agent.
Name of the shipping agent.
Description or additional details about the shipping agent.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table containing information about shipping agents.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each document.
Code representing the current status of the document.
Code representing the type of the document.
Code for the shipping agent associated with the document.
Date and time when the document was received.
Unique number assigned to the document upon receipt.
Additional details or notes about the document.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about documents including their status, type, and shipping details.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each employee.
Code representing the role of the employee, linked to the Roles table.
Name of the employee.
Additional details about the employee.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about employees within the organization, including their role and contact details.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document to which the draft belongs.
Sequential number indicating the version of the draft.
Details or content of the draft document.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores draft versions of documents, including details about each draft.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document.
Identifier for the draft version of the document.
Sequential number for copies of the document.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about draft copies of documents, linking them to their respective drafts and copies.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document.
Identifier for the draft version of the document.
Sequential number for copies of the document.
Identifier for the employee involved in the document's circulation.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records the circulation history of documents, including details about drafts, copies, and employees involved.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document, linked to the Documents table.
Identifier for the address where the document was mailed, linked to the Addresses table.
Date and time when the document was mailed.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records information about documents that have been mailed.
